title: The works of Robert Burns;
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: John Hay's Bonnie Lassie was daughter of John Hay, earl or marquis of Tweeddale, and late countess dowager of Roxburgh.— She died at Broomlands, near Kelso, some time between the years 1720 and 1740.

title: The complete works of Robert Burns:
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: — She died at Broomlands, near Kelso, some time between  the years 1720 and 1740.
